website_summaries.verdict: An affordable trio of some of kids' favorite Sesame Street characters that provide fun for little ones in and out of the tub.
pros: Elmo, Ernie, and Cookie Monster characters designed to squirt water
Ideal for toddlers, as they are about 3 inches tall and easy for little hands to hold
Parents say kids enjoy carrying them and playing with them before, during, and after bath time
cons: Come with a plastic odor, but tends to fade with use
A bit difficult for tiny hands to squeeze

customer_reviews.title: Okay as bath toys but odd wax coating and chemical smell..
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these since my toddler loves Elmo and Sesame Street.. the box packaging was great however the actual product package was already open and bath figures falling out. They are large, have an odd coating and smells toxic. I'm hoping they are safe but I'm doubtful. My toddler was present when I opened so of course was in love and immediately took to them and we used for bath time. They are okay in the water, look enough like the characters and do squirt water but I can't get over the already opened package, waxy/greasy coating and awful chemical smell. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon O.

customer_reviews.title: Fun bath squirter!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son has become obsessed with Sesame Street, especially Cookie Monster. These were perfect for him! They are about 3 inches high and fit in his little hands. The plastic they are made of is very soft and easy to squeeze. A lot of bath toys we have found are so hard to get the water out of and that is not the case with these. The colors of the figurines are brilliant! So cute and adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Not great bath toy
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable plastic figures. Very colorful but poor design. They didn’t squirt well and also think they could get moldy inside, as there is no way to clean them. Disappointed for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The picture and description shows 3 bath toys in package(Elmo, Cookie Monster, and Ernie) but package only came with one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I got this set 4 years back for under $8. We never used the figures in bath. The figures still look like new. The figures are colorful and lightweight. My son loves watching Sesame Street in his sp ed pre-k classroom and likes playing pretend with the figures.
customer_reviews.author: Indranil Biswas

customer_reviews.title: Grandchild LOVES these
customer_reviews.text: Easy simple toy for pool or bath or just to hold and play. Not too thick but sturdy enough. Non toxic pliable soft material. We had a happy little child playing with these simple toys for hours. Washable and just great
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great Bath Toys!
customer_reviews.text: My baby love these bath toys. She has a lot of fun playing with them. They keep her entertained long enough for give me to give her a proper bath. The only complaint I have is that the toys does not always go back to its shape after squeezing it. We bought these because our baby loves Sesame Street otherwise there are probably better and/or cheaper options.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely amazing. Soft plastic and very much enjoyed for teething toys!! Great gift option!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. My daughter loves them. The hole where the water squeezes out is in a spot that makes it hard for the water to squirt out (which is fine with me) but besides that I have no complaints. It's a strong plastic material and the color is very shiny on it unlike most bath toys.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Blithe

customer_reviews.title: I like that they don't fill up with water and become ...
customer_reviews.text: my son loves these! I like that they don't fill up with water and become moldy over time. Easy to throw in the dishwasher as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to squirt time!
customer_reviews.text: The Squirters, of course Sesame Street, add an extra dimension to bath time. My twin granddaughters love them and can’t get enough. They need to be at least 18 months old to play with and squirt.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C.

customer_reviews.title: Good size and fun bath buddies
customer_reviews.text: These are my toddlers best bath buddies! She is an Elmo fan and loves to play with these bath squirters. Before buying them I was concerned abiout the size whether they are too small or too big but they turned out perfect standard sizer for a 15 month old to hold and play.
customer_reviews.author: Star2008

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: They are sturdy little squirters and maintain their quality even after being chewed. We bought these for my 18 month old as little figures (not for the the tub). Love their size
customer_reviews.author: Kris L

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: He was so happy to get the set and uses them every night in the bath. He loves the squirts!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Cohen

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son, who hates bath time. He loves them. He still hates bath time, but these keep him occupied long enough to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Nelbert01

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the barh
customer_reviews.text: Great bath toys for my grandson. He walks around with them a lot of the tome
customer_reviews.author: Connie l. Walters

customer_reviews.title: Fun bath toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved these. He plays with them during every bath. Water squirts out of each one.
customer_reviews.author: BP76

customer_reviews.title: Good size bath toys
customer_reviews.text: Good size bath toys, a bit bigger than all the other ducks/animals I have and seem to be heavier plastic too. Nice bright colours.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and perfect for daddy to do ...
customer_reviews.text: We use them as little toys and as biting toys. we haven't used them in the bath. Great for the price and perfect for daddy to do his Ernie and cooky monster impersonation (ME WANT COOKIES!)
customer_reviews.author: Guy S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves these. She asks for them at bath time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was obsessed
customer_reviews.text: We put these in her Christmas stocking and she loved them more than any of her expensive gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cute
customer_reviews.text: So much fun in the tubby and in the ocean! Earnie’s nose cracked open after about 5 months. So it can’t really squirt anymore. But these are really fun and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Allysyn

customer_reviews.title: Smelly and very thin material
customer_reviews.text: My 14 month old daughter absolutely loves Elmo. However, this product really disappointed us. The smell after opening and washing the figures is still very strong. The material the figures are made of is very, very thin. I will be surprised if they last a month.
customer_reviews.author: asnelso

customer_reviews.title: Strong plastic type smell!
customer_reviews.text: Characters are cute but when we took them out of the package they had a terrible, strong plastic type smell. Even since we've had them out in the fresh air they still retain some of the scent. I do not feel comfortable having my child put these in their mouth due to the strong odor and as a result they have been relegated to the drainboard. Should've just returned them and got our money back but my Hubby got them and as I said I do like the color and style of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Multi Use
customer_reviews.text: Great price. I actually used these as a cake topper and then for the bath later. :)
customer_reviews.author: Meag

customer_reviews.title: Can get moldy!
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality toys. Make sure you hot glue the holes to prevent mold from growing inside the toys!
customer_reviews.author: Peter C

customer_reviews.title: Next bath:)))
customer_reviews.text: This was for my neighbors baby she said he loves them and can’t wait for his next bath..
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids love these! They are fun in the tub as well as the pool! :) great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Riemer Faber

customer_reviews.title: We Love Sesame Characters
customer_reviews.text: Perfect toys for my grandson. Played with them in the tub, the pool and everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Verbs5

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My two year old son had a ball with these in the bath tub. They are a little softer than some other squirters, which makes them easier to use for little hands. I recommend for tub, pool, beach or even for every day play.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Zaconie

customer_reviews.title: love Sesame Street
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter, age 2, love Sesame Street; Elmo specifically. These squirt toys are a little difficult to fill up with water, but that may ease after continued use. My granddaughter LOVES them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pruett

customer_reviews.title: Grandbaby loves them.
customer_reviews.text: These are the first toys my grandson goes to when he gets to my house. The are the right size for his hands and he likes to chew on them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Squires

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to play with these. They just don’t soak in the water to squirt very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toddler love!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves Sesame Street and loves playing with these toys all the time! They are small enough to through in the diaper bag and take with us in the car and everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Adorable little guys.
customer_reviews.text: What's not to think is cute? We don't use these in the bath as he has some other squirt toys. One word of caution on squirt toys....get them dry on the inside or you will be squirting some nasty stuff at the next bath.... But these are cute and my son uses these in play time.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than i expected!
customer_reviews.text: I saw pictures and it looked small to me and i didn't really mind. Until it came in and i was shocked on how bug and cute they are in person! My nephew loves these and I'm happy i got this.
customer_reviews.author: Aracely Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good product for very young children
customer_reviews.text: Great toys for in and out of the tub -- especially for very little people. And easy to put one in your pocket so that your child has something to play with in the shopping car or the restaurant high chair.
customer_reviews.author: HARTFORD HOTDOG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for bathtime play!
customer_reviews.text: These are our toddlers favorite bath toys! They are adorable and the perfect size for little hands. Turns bathtime into playtime!
customer_reviews.author: kelly lewis

customer_reviews.title: So so.
customer_reviews.text: Fun, but not long lasting. They take on water in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: erikmalinowski

customer_reviews.title: Most beloved toys my child has!
customer_reviews.text: Our little boy (almost 2) is OBSESSED with these. He carries them around everywhere and sleeps with them at night. I try to keep them out of the tub to avoid a mold/mildew issue. Occasionally they have gone for a swim, and it is a little hard to get all of the water out.
customer_reviews.author: ERCArk

customer_reviews.title: and they look a little funny, but they still get played with
customer_reviews.text: The noses get stuck in, and they look a little funny, but they still get played with.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: I gave these to my great granddaughter on her first birthday along with the peek ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my great granddaughter on her first birthday along with the peek a boo elmo, and she loves them. If you have a little one I highly recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is lots of fun to have bath time with Elmo
customer_reviews.text: It is lots of fun to have bath time with Elmo, Cookie and Bert. The kids love playing in the tub and squirting everything around them including the person helping them in the tub. These have been so fun that I have ordered the Minnie Mouse set to get some variety.
customer_reviews.author: Happy-Leroy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The kid love it but it is hard the get the water to come out (by squirting) and the water is staying inside the toy (which is not good) Also the box looks like it was open before and some one close is with some tape
customer_reviews.author: jonathan yeger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: our grandson is teething and loves to chew on these. Large enough so they can't be swallowed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Bath time fun for the toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Super adorable set! I got it at a great price and used them as part of my son's Easter Basket! My son is obsessed with Elmo and loves playing with the squirters in the shower. Great value when on sale. I wouldn't pay $10 for them though.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Waste of your money
customer_reviews.text: fine for a bath toy but a bath squirters I think not. I think hole it too small and not in a good place on toy to squeeze water in and when you do get a little bit of water in its barely squirts out water. Also its hard to get all the water out of the toy, so I imagine it will get moldy inside.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: but I was hoping for them to be more fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: These are hard plastic---not as "squishy" as you might think and re hard to fill with water and squirt. My kiddo is a huge Elmo fan and she still likes them, but I was hoping for them to be more fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Alison H.

customer_reviews.title: Sesame Street squirters
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a gift so they haven't taken them out of the package yet but they look really cute and I think she'll be very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M

customer_reviews.title: I do suggest plugging the holes (I used super glue) and rendering the squirt function void
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter loves these toys. I do suggest plugging the holes (I used super glue) and rendering the squirt function void. We have had issues with mold building up inside similar squirter toys in the past.
customer_reviews.author: UTAH7.62x39

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set of what appears to be 3 bath squirters. I only received one. The pictures states "squirters" not "squirter". This is false advertising as it is only for 1 figure not 3 as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cook

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my three year old grandson when he was visiting. They never made it into the tub, but they took many bus rides and engaged in other playtime activities.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mathewson

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old absolutely loves these! I bought 2 packages so he has spares when he loses one or all... I know they're intended for the tub, but he loves to carry them around with him! Great buy that's for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Elmo cookimonster and ernie bathtub fun
customer_reviews.text: These sesame street bathtub squirters are great my grandaughter loved playing with them in the bathtub she actually took a bath just to play with them and she was in there till the water was cold
customer_reviews.author: S. Chrans

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: They are bath squirt toys... not much to say about them. My kids love the characters, and the toys feel like they will actually hold up for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Love these both in and outside the tub
customer_reviews.text: My 13 month old loves these. They are super cute and he even plays with them outside the tub. If you are a fan of Sesame Street these are a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter who is 12 months old loves these inside and out of the tub.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: This product is cute but doesn't work properly. Once ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is cute but doesn't work properly. Once they fill up with water it does not squirt out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Leake

customer_reviews.title: like to play with them
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, my 10 month old can not squirt these. They are difficult to fill and squirt. He does, however, like to play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Allen

customer_reviews.title: These are very difficult to get enough water in to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very difficult to get enough water in to squirt....and if you don't ensure you've squeezed all of the water out they'll smell moldy
customer_reviews.author: nursie104

customer_reviews.title: Great product and super affordable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these an Easter gifts for the little kids in the family. They just adored them!! Great product and super affordable.
customer_reviews.author: ZombieZelda

customer_reviews.title: Smells very strongly of chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these smelled so strongly of chemicals (even after washing them with soap) that I didn't feel comfortable giving them to a child who would probably chew on them during play.
customer_reviews.author: Athome_2

customer_reviews.title: Cute Sesame Buddies!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Cute And Good Quality Sesame Buddies! Extremely Pleased Purchased!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the favorite tub toys. Perfect size for little hands

customer_reviews.title: my baby's best friend. Once he sees Elmo
customer_reviews.text: Elmo, my baby's best friend. Once he sees Elmo, his face lights up. Bath buddies.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, I’m sure will be a big hit for my granddaughter (an AVID Elmo Fan).

customer_reviews.title: Favorite take along toy
customer_reviews.text: Favorite take along toy. washable , soft and my grandson is teething and will freguently play and chew with these.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy M. Champney

customer_reviews.title: ... got these for my daughter and they are a great quality product
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter and they are a great quality product. She stopped playing with her bath toys she already had the instant she saw these and hasn't stopped. This is a great investment for the little ones and I highly recommend these toys. They are great quality too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bedel

customer_reviews.title: but we purchased them for their squirting ability and they just don't suck in the water in order to squirt
customer_reviews.text: These look cute and my daughter enjoys playing with them, but we purchased them for their squirting ability and they just don't suck in the water in order to squirt. My husband even tried to make the holes bigger and they just don't suck in water. They simply collapse and do nothing. So not a total waste, but I certainly would not have purchased them if I had known they wouldn't squirt.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dusterberg

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: They are colorful and cure, but super thin cheap plastic. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves these bath squirters. She calls them her babies!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Don't squirt so good and little hard for little hands to squeeze
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected for my 16 month old. Don't squirt so good and little hard for little hands to squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Clark

customer_reviews.title: ... was opened previously then was "re-taped" and shipped out like that. Disappointed in the product - material looks ...
customer_reviews.text: The original packaging was opened previously then was "re-taped" and shipped out like that. Disappointed in the product - material looks and feels low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Denisse S

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but they do retain a little water. ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but they do retain a little water. You have to make sure you squeeze as much water out every time you use them to avoid mold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old daughter loves these bath toys and actually takes them everywhere with her

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift for my Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with the Sesame Street Cookie Monster Bath Submarine Toy for my granddaughter. My granddaughter loves these toys!

customer_reviews.title: These are fun and my son loves them
customer_reviews.text: These are fun and my son loves them... But he's two. The noses get poked in and don't pop back out so that creapy.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kids live these in the Pool and the Bath.

customer_reviews.title: Cute & nice size for small hands .
customer_reviews.text: They look very cute good size for small hands. They were a gift, mom said baby 1yr loved them

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: The toys came in a box that had definitely been opened and re-taped. Not impressed.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product.
customer_reviews.text: It’s supposed to be a 3 pack of toys, but we only got Cookie Monster. Not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Jaffe

customer_reviews.title: Fun summer play
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit with my son. We use them in the pool, he loves being able to squirt everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Janet G

customer_reviews.title: Too hard for my kids to press.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty much cute little statues that get thrown around in the bathtub. They're too hard to press to get them to fill with water so using them for their purpose is unrealistic especially for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Belle

customer_reviews.title: Love them !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 sets of these. One for each grandchild-- they LOVE them in the bath & just to play with.

customer_reviews.title: Great in and out of Bath Time
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew and he loved it. he is about 9 months old at the time. They are soft so he even likes to play with them outside of bath time. I would buy these again for a gift any day.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bath toys
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES these! He carries them around in the bath and after the bath!

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Bigger than I pictured
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Bigger than I pictured. A great hit with the 2 year old grandson. Very sturdy!

customer_reviews.title: My 2.5yr old boy loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for my toddler to grab, cute and no weird rubber odors that some toys have. A great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are bigger than I expected but my Sesame Street loving 16 month old loves them!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: kids love to play with them both in the bath and outside the bath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son loves them and it makes bath time more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: David N

customer_reviews.title: CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and have held up to my dog chomping on them. My 2 year old granddaughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Amato

customer_reviews.title: Caution!
customer_reviews.text: Package had clearly been torn open previously, and put back together with scotch tape. Not giving my child a toy that has clearly been tampered with.
customer_reviews.author: CTanner

customer_reviews.title: Great characters not so great product.
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved them. Find it difficult to clear out all water. So two of them had to be tossed out for whatever was growing in them.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them.
customer_reviews.text: These are a must for bath time. No bath could be complete without Elmo Cookie Monster and Ernie
customer_reviews.author: PKJ8484

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My son would be scared of the running water from the shower head when I transitioned him for baby bath in his tub which I would put in the sink. Now hes happy with his sesame street friends when I bathe him.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but difficult
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves the characters; however, they are hard to fill up with water until I widened the holes.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: These are adorable, My 8 month old grandson loves them

product_meta.title: Sesame Street Bath Squirters, Bath Toys featuring Elmo, Cookie Monster and Ernie, Ages 12 Months - 4 Years Assortment (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description:
Cookie Monster, Ernie, and Elmo are wearing their swim trunks and ready to play! These collectible Sesame Street squirt toys are sure to make bath time lots of fun. Squeeze the figures underwater to fill them up, then squeeze again to send water jetting across the tub. 

Sesame Street and associated characters, trademarks and design elements are owned and licensed by Sesame Workshop. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: High quality toys for children all ages
Preschoolers will love playing with their favorite sesame street characters in the tub
Squirting water makes bath time fun
Preschoolers will love playing with their favorite Sesame Street characters in the tub
Squirting water makes bath time fun
Toys are easy for little hands to fill and hold
Includes Ernie, Elmo, and Cookie Monster squirt figures

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars692 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
